name: project_myrequest_back_end
description: *As a registered user, I want to create a room so I can display my requested song list. *As a registered user, I want to receive song requests from other users so I can accept or decline adding the requests to my requested song list. *As a website visitor, I want to enter in a unique pin so I can join a room hosted by another user. *As a website visitor, I want to search for songs so I can send over requests to the room host user. *As a website visitor, I want to create comments so I can interact with other users in a room.
